adus.text: Man has the chance to become everything.
Pico holds that God creates Intellect, a perfect and unique creation.
83 (God from eternity produced a creature of incorporeal and intellectual nature, as perfect as is possible for a created being.)
93 This is not an act of pure creation, according either Christians or the Neoplatonists.
As a result, humans are capable of achieving true knowledge and felicity.
Man has the chance to become everything.
